services.name: Office and Commercial Cleaning
services.description: Ensure a productive and healthy environment for your team. Our detailed office cleaning services are designed to maintain professionalism and hygiene throughout your workspace.
paragraphs: Maintain a Pristine environment. Our meticulous office and commercial cleaning services in Ottawa ensure your workplace is spotless, healthy, and welcoming every day. Whether you manage a small office, a large building, a retail store, a plaza, or an event venue, our professional team keeps your environment polished and ready to impress both staff and clients. As a locally owned Ottawa company with over 15 years of experience, Reyes Maintenance Service Inc. is trusted for delivering reliable, high-quality cleaning solutions that reflect your business’s professionalism.

Our commercial cleaning programs in Ottawa are designed to handle every detail of your facility. Services include dusting and polishing surfaces, vacuuming and mopping floors, sanitizing washrooms and kitchens, cleaning interior glass and partitions, trash and recycling removal, and disinfecting high‑touch points such as door handles, and switches. Every plan is customized to match your facility’s size, traffic level, and operating schedule, ensuring consistent results that enhance productivity and create a healthier environment for employees and visitors alike. In addition to cleaning, we can also provide essential supplies such as paper products, hand soap, and sanitizers, ensuring your workplace is always fully stocked and ready for daily operations.
